channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Warren Buffett gave this timely investment advice at Berkshire’s annual meeting
item.description: The Berkshire Hathaway CEO had some choice words for investors before announcing he was stepping down after six decades.

item.title: ‘We are the most privileged’: My husband and I are tired of paying for our friends. How do we get them to pay their way?
item.description: “My husband almost always ends up paying for everyone or picks up the entire bill.”

item.title: International stocks have been crushing U.S. equities. Morgan Stanley expects a reversal.
item.description: Mike Wilson, chief market strategist at Morgan Stanley, says he likes U.S. over international equities from here

item.title: My sister has a learning disability and her husband squandered $100,000. How do I protect her from his financial misdeeds?
item.description: “She always worked part-time in a grocery store or at stock-clerk jobs until COVID. He does Instacart and similar deliveries for work.”

item.title: My friend’s partner is pregnant, but she’s married to another man. Is he financially responsible?
item.description: “She claimed her husband was cheating on her and stopped paying their mortgage.”

item.title: UBS says this energy stock that's outperforming this year is primed for even more gains ahead
item.description: A couple of catalysts could send shares of EQT even higher over the next year, according to UBS.

item.title: Dick's Sporting Goods is unlocking the power of youth sports with this under-the-radar business
item.description: Dick's Sporting Goods' GameChanger is "a key long term growth and margin driver," said Michael Baker, an analyst at D.A. Davidson.

item.title: JPMorgan’s favorite stocks heading into May
item.description: JPMorgan's list of top stock picks heading into May include new additions Netflix and Ulta Beauty.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts are bullish on these 3 dividend stocks for stable returns
item.description: TipRanks' analyst ranking service spotlights three dividend-paying stocks, including AT&T and Texas Instruments.

item.title: Activist Fivespan has a stake in Qiagen. Here are 3 levers to boost the company’s growth and improve value
item.description: Management at Qiagen has done the hard things right, but there is now an opportunity for the company to grow faster and in a more focused way.
